WHERE QNANUM>0
AND QNASUBJECT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND QNACONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND QNANAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM R, B.* FROM( SELECT * FROM QNABOARD
ORDER BY QNANUM DESC ) B ) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
